sentences.sentence: An American officer on the scene said no one had intruded into the space he was defending.
sentences.translation: 现场的一名美国军官说还没有人闯入过他所防卫的区域。

sentences.sentence: Nearing the central part, her echoes were intruded on by other sounds; and seeing the barn, she guessed these to be the utterances of the preacher.
sentences.translation: 在靠近中心的地方，她的回声受到了其他声音的干扰；看到谷仓，她猜想这是牧师的声音。

sentences.sentence: The thief intruded into the house with caution and dissimulation.
sentences.translation: 窃贼小心掩饰地潜入室内。
